item.title: 999999999 (9 nines)
item.description: Ha! I caught you. I bet you think this post is about HA or some way to keep your servers running. Nope, just an observation. 1,2,3) Today is 9/9/9 4) there are 9 letters in September 5) there are 9 letters inÂ Wednesday 6) it is the 252 day of the year, 2+5+2=9, 7) I was born 9/9/81, 8) 9×9=81, 9) 8+1=9. Wow and to think it was such a problematic day at work!
